oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Cpl. Albert Griswold
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tintype of Cpl. Albert Griswold (notice crossed cannons on the bottom of the frame). It is included in an album of images of Griswold covering his life. Griswold was born on December 14, 1843, in Fitchburg, Mass. He enlisted, as a private, in Co. A, 53rd Mass. Inf., US, on August 23, 1862, and mustered out at Camp Stevens, Mass., on September 2, 1863. He re-enlisted with Co. H, 4th Mass. Heavy Artillery on August 1, 1864, and served until June 17, 1865. Griswold died from a stroke on April 26, 1908.
